quote.msg: 有冇邊啲必睇既書推薦?

replies.msg:
入門都係嗰三條友
Marx - capital, communist manifesto
Weber - Protestant ethic, science/politics as a vocation
Durkheim - suicide, division of labour

之後睇啲近代啲
Mauss, Bourdieu, Frankfurt school, Parsons, Carl Schmitt, George mead, goffman, dewey, simmel, berger

之後睇社會理論
Freud, Foucault, nietzsche, lukacs, gramsci, Hegel, Heidegger, Strauss, lowith, kojeve, Walter Benjamin

之後睇專業領域
Utilitarian, neo utilitarian, critique of utilitarian
Marxism, neo marxism, post Marxism
Structural functionalism, post structuralism
Symbolic interactionism, social constructionism
Mary Douglas, Olsen, hirschmann, schumpeter, Skinner, Charles tilly

最後睇番嗰三條友
Marx - young marx including German ideology, Jewish question, critique of hegel, Epicurus, Eighteenth Brumaire
Weber - China, India, Jew, economy and society, 重睇 science politics as a vocation
Durkheim - religious practices, philosophy of education, primitive classification

replies.msg:
想太多了
如果想讀soci或者規範式soci呢 都係美國啦
英聯邦 歐洲都係垃圾
但睇你應該係想讀社會理論 即係soci偏philo
咁德國係個好選擇
法國都okay 戰後法國社會理論好撚勁
德國勁喺戰前
但soci都係美國玩撚哂

內容都淨係記得少少

Sorry for 1999

想太多了
如果想讀soci或者規範式soci呢 都係美國啦
英聯邦 歐洲都係垃圾
但睇你應該係想讀社會理論 即係soci偏philo

其實我自己睇嘅廣而不精
乜都知皮毛only
不過巴打你啱我自己都偏好鐘意philo果面
巴打可唔可以講多啲有咩大分別咁

replies.msg:
我覺得廣同精唔係對立
因為當你真係睇得廣嘅時候 就會慢慢睇得精
如果只係隨手睇一本書 唔係唔得 而係好難做到精
我自己都好鍾意社會理論 但何奈社會理論喺soci好難作為一個sub field岀現 而且做theory好需要閱讀量同天份
我自己係走德國嗰條思想線 即係唯心主義傳統
咁一定係由max weber開始 睇幾本 然後用science politics as a vocation切入
跟住睇simmel, lukacs, nietzsche, leo strauss, Schopenhauer
再上到Hegel
中間亦可以睇Frankfurt school, Freud, Walter benjamin, young marx

quote.msg: Year 4留名

讀Sociology真係人生轉捩點

replies.msg:
Weber - science politics as a vocation
Simmel - Schopenhauer and nietzsche, the view of life
Lukacs - theory of novel, destruction of reason
Nietzsche - genealogy of morals, beyond good and evil
Leo Strauss - natural rights

replies.msg: Historical sociology，sociological theory，sociology of knowledge，cultural sociology，sociology of language嗰範，我有興趣嘅係人的意識和思考同個社會的互動關係嘅最基原本原理在歷史時空中一直點樣變緊，理想係可以好似anthony giddens咁寫到個繼往開來的大宗，不過佢個structuation theory都真係去得好盡，都好難可以再沿呢條脈絡推落去

quote.msg: 有冇邊啲必睇既書推薦?

入門都係嗰三條友
Marx - capital, communist manifesto
Weber - Protestant ethic, science/politics as a vocation
Durkheim - suicide, division of labour

之後睇啲近代啲
Mauss, Bourdieu, Frankfurt school, Parsons, Carl Schmitt, George mead, goffman, dewey, simmel, berger

之後睇社會理論
Freud, Foucault, nietzsche, lukacs, gramsci, Hegel, Heidegger, Strauss, lowith, kojeve, Walter Benjamin

之後睇專業領域
Utilitarian, neo utilitarian, critique of utilitarian
Marxism, neo marxism, post Marxism
Structural functionalism, post structuralism
Symbolic interactionism, social constructionism
Mary Douglas, Olsen, hirschmann, schumpeter, Skinner, Charles tilly

最後睇番嗰三條友
Marx - young marx including German ideology, Jewish question, critique of hegel, Epicurus, Eighteenth Brumaire
Weber - China, India, Jew, economy and society, 重睇 science politics as a vocation
Durkheim - religious practices, philosophy of education, primitive classification

巴打你咩level
可以咁清楚列出嚟

好多勁巴打

你地係自學到咁定點

Soci教嘅係一種視野，用一個之前從來無諗過的角度去望一件事同考察呢件事同其他事的關係

咁樣講的話對工作的用途很微妙，叫做提供左啲新角度比你處理啲野囉，可能某個時刻呢樣會對升遷有重大影響，情況同讀哲學學習思考方法差唔多
